name: prife
description:
Turn every day of your life in a cheerful and motivating game

Create games as a set of missions. Invite your friends to play or watch. Mission complition is proved with a photo. For every mission you get points. Compete with friends to score more points. Together, you have a fun looking at pictures of your friends.

Prife is oriented to everyday use. It is able to make every person's daily life rich and interesting.

 * Choose game from the available examples, borrow from friends, or create it yourself
 * By fulfilling missions in games you achieve your life goals. In fact, that's how you live a full life
 * Invite your friends to play your life with you
